title: Inside Bengaluru doctor’s dark plan: Wife killed with anaesthesia overdose
description: A Bengaluru doctor, Mahendra Reddy, has been arrested for allegedly murdering his wife, Dr. Kritika Reddy, six months ago. Her death was initially attributed to natural causes, but forensic reports revealed toxic substances. Mahendra reportedly confessed to poisoning her, citing marital discord over undisclosed health issues. Investigations are ongoing.

title: -Serena Williams vs Maria Sharapova net worth 2025: Who is richer?
description: Tennis titans Serena Williams and Maria Sharapova, despite different paths to success, remain influential figures. Williams, with a net worth of $350 million, continues investing and supporting women's sports. Sharapova, valued at $180 million, thrives with her candy business and real estate ventures. A touching Hall of Fame moment highlighted their enduring respect and friendship.
